Posts.Content: Jan 31, 2018 10:04AM Jennifer522 wrote: I too thought the storage was on the bags, not the saline itself. My pre-meds have been pushed since I believe #3 chemo in early November. I find them harder on me. I get woozy or feel weird with them. The feeling does not last long. I have a port though, so it may be different if you do not. I am surprised too that the bag storage has not made the news. Or other companies have not stepped up their production enough to cover the storage. With the flu epidemic, I am sure the shortage is getting worse.

Posts.Content: Apr 5, 2018 09:20AM Jennifer522 wrote: Are you getting any PS with the masectomy (expanders put in)? Since I am the PS is considered the lead surgeon My surgery is 4/10 and I have appt with PS 4/13 and 4/18 and BS 4/20. Glad lots of appts, that they just don't send you home and see you in 2 weeks. I assume dressing changes and drain management will the addressed at those appts.

Posts.Content: Jan 26, 2018 08:13AM Jennifer522 wrote: I am noticing white hairs coming up on my head. The feathers or baby chick look, I have read about. They are just stubble right now but I can see and feel them. Thanks for mentioning Wunderbrow, I just ordered some from Amazon. I was looking at something for my lashes and I have heard about Lash Boost by Rodan and Fields but $150. Umm, no. I only have a few bottom lashes, pretty sparse on top but mascara helps on top only. Last chemo is March 20th and hoping by the first week of June I can go capless/wiggless.
Posts.Title: Hair Hair Hair - Another question Deen Krose53

Posts.Content: Mar 31, 2018 11:43PM Jennifer522 wrote: When did your eyebrows start growing back? Mine started to thin around the beginning of the year and I have been completely eyebrowless since February. Finished chemo about 2 weeks ago
Posts.Title: Hair Hair Hair - Another question Deen Krose53

Posts.Content: Jan 31, 2018 12:41PM Jennifer522 wrote: I am getting taxol every 3 weeks, 6 times. #4 is next week. I have been getting fuzz growing on my head after being smooth Mr. Clean bald. My eyelashes are pretty much gone on the bottom, 3 or so hairs left. But I can see short little ones growing. My eyebrows are thinned in the inner section and only a few hairs hanging on in the outer section. Today I noticed growing hairs in the inner section, looks like hairs a few days after shaving. I am guessing all these "re-growth" hairs will fall out again before I truely start to grow some head hair, eyelashes and eyebrows back post chemo
Posts.Title: Hair Hair Hair - Another question Deen Krose53

Posts.Content: Sep 30, 2018 12:34AM Jennifer522 wrote: Hi Rhonda. I am also in Greenville being treated at GHS. My type of cancer, chemo is a must since it’s not hormonal. Some women will travel to Dana Farber in Boston, MD Anderson in Houston or Sloan in NYC. Have you thought of getting a second opinion at GHS or Bon Secour. Or if your willing to travel to Duke. I didn’t get a second but I had to get into chemo right away and my treatment is on line with what other centers are doing.
